mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(CAST(MAX(RIGHT(productOrderCode,3))+1 AS CHAR), 3, '0') AS newCodeNum FROM k1_tb_product_order;

SELECT pod.productOrderOngoingCode ,pod.itemName ,pod.productCount ,pod.productPrice ,pod.productShipmentDate ,pod.`COMMENT` FROM k1_view_product_order_detail AS pod WHERE pod.productOrderCode = CONCAT('product_orderCode_', #{productOrderCode})

SELECT RIGHT(po.productOrderCode,3) as productOrderCode, po.mainBusinessCode, mb.businessName, po.contractCode, po.clientCode, c.businessName AS clientBusinessName, po.`status`, po.itemName, po.totalCount, po.totalPrice, po.briefs as briefs, po.productOrderDate as productOrderDate, po.productDate as productDate, po.predictProductDate as predictProductDate, po.managerId as managerId, po.managerName, po.regDate as regDate, po.updateDate as updateDate FROM k1_view_product_order AS po INNER JOIN k1_tb_main_business AS mb on mb.mainBusinessCode = po.mainBusinessCode JOIN k1_tb_client AS c on c.clientCode = po.clientCode WHERE po.productOrderCode = CONCAT('productOrderCode_', #{productOrderCode})

SELECT RIGHT(po.productOrderCode,3) as productOrderCode, po.mainBusinessCode as mainBusinessCode, po.contractCode as contractCode, po.clientCode as clientCode, po.clientBusinessName as clientBusinessName, po.`status`, po.itemName as itemName, po.totalCount, po.totalPrice, po.briefs as briefs, po.productOrderDate as productOrderDate, po.productDate as productDate, po.predictProductDate as predictProductDate, po.managerId as managerId, po.managerName, po.regDate as regDate, po.updateDate as updateDate, po.totalCount AS totalCount, po.totalPrice AS totalPrice FROM k1_view_product_order AS po

SELECT RIGHT(po.productOrderCode,3) as productOrderCode, po.mainBusinessCode, po.contractCode, po.clientCode, po.clientBusinessName, po.`status`, po.itemName, po.totalCount, po.totalPrice, po.briefs, po.productOrderDate, po.productDate, po.predictProductDate, po.managerId, po.managerName, po.regDate, po.updateDate FROM k1_view_product_order AS po
